name: Send email notifications for new Facebook Lead Ads submissions
description: Effortlessly manage your leads with this template that connects Facebook Lead Ads and your email service. Every time a new lead is captured through your Facebook Lead Ads, Make will automatically send a personalized email to that lead, ensuring timely follow-up and engagement. This streamlined workflow not only saves you time but also enhances your lead nurturing process, helping you convert potential customers more effectively.
